reviewText: This is a very basic introductory form for Chang Quan (Long Fist) that is short and easy to learn. It introduces the basic stances, kicks, blocks, and strikes, as well as demonstrates the general flow of the modern wushu / kung fu performance forms. The form is demonstrated first in its entirety and then slowly shown movement by movement. No practical application discussion is included, but that is typical for the publically available DVD materials.
